movie_name: Title : The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
cast: Cast : Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
movie_description: Summary : Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe
movie_description: Summary : A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

movie_name: Title : The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
cast: Cast : Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
movie_description: Summary : A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movie_name: Title : The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
cast: Cast : Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom
movie_description: Summary : While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movie_name: Title : The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
cast: Cast : Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffrè
movie_description: Summary : A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

cast: Cast : Rakshit Shetty, Charlie, Sangeetha Sringeri, Raj B. Shetty
movie_description: Summary : Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

directors: Director : Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
cast: Cast : Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Brian Tyree Henry, Luna Lauren Velez
movie_description: Summary : Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

cast: Cast : Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Mackenzie Foy
movie_description: Summary : When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

movie_name: Title : Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
cast: Cast : Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
movie_description: Summary : After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

movie_name: Title : Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
cast: Cast : Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness
movie_description: Summary : Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

cast: Cast : Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino, Rumi Hiiragi
movie_description: Summary : During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

cast: Cast : Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
movie_description: Summary : A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

cast: Cast : Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
movie_description: Summary : Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

cast: Cast : Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg
movie_description: Summary : Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

cast: Cast : Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movie_description: Summary : After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

cast: Cast : Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth, Mélanie Laurent
movie_description: Summary : In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

cast: Cast : Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn, Paul Reiser
movie_description: Summary : Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

directors: Director : Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
cast: Cast : Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
movie_description: Summary : Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

cast: Cast : Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach
movie_description: Summary : Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

cast: Cast : Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
movie_description: Summary : The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movie_name: Title : Raiders of the Lost Ark
cast: Cast : Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys-Davies
movie_description: Summary : In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

cast: Cast : Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
movie_description: Summary : In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

cast: Cast : Karthi, Narain, Arjun Das, George Maryan
movie_description: Summary : Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

cast: Cast : Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter
movie_description: Summary : After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
movie_description: Summary : A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

cast: Cast : Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger, Christopher Plummer
movie_description: Summary : 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

movie_name: Title : Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
cast: Cast : Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
movie_description: Summary : After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

cast: Cast : Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn, Jack Hawkins
movie_description: Summary : The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

cast: Cast : Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason, Jessie Royce Landis
movie_description: Summary : A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

cast: Cast : Yôji Matsuda, Yuriko Ishida, Yûko Tanaka, Billy Crudup
movie_description: Summary : On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty
movie_description: Summary : The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

cast: Cast : Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon
movie_description: Summary : With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

cast: Cast : Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
movie_description: Summary : A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

cast: Cast : Chieko Baishô, Takuya Kimura, Tatsuya Gashûin, Akihiro Miwa
movie_description: Summary : When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

cast: Cast : Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
movie_description: Summary : After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movie_name: Title : Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
cast: Cast : Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody, Denholm Elliott
movie_description: Summary : In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

movie_name: Title : Monty Python and the Holy Grail
cast: Cast : Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Gilliam
movie_description: Summary : King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

cast: Cast : Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson
movie_description: Summary : Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

directors: Director : Sergio Pablos, Carlos Martínez López
cast: Cast : Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones, Will Sasso
movie_description: Summary : A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

movie_name: Title : Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Movie: Mugen Train
cast: Cast : Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitô, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Hiro Shimono
movie_description: Summary : After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

movie_name: Title : The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
cast: Cast : Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt, Bruce Bennett
movie_description: Summary : Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

cast: Cast : Yves Montand, Charles Vanel, Peter van Eyck, Folco Lulli
movie_description: Summary : In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

cast: Cast : Rishab Shetty, Kishore Kumar G., Achyuth Kumar, Sapthami Gowda
movie_description: Summary : When greed paves the way for betrayal, scheming and murder, a young tribal reluctantly dons the traditions of his ancestors to seek justice.

cast: Cast : Maksim Munzuk, Yuriy Solomin, Mikhail Bychkov, Vladimir Khrulyov
movie_description: Summary : The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

cast: Cast : Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult, Zoë Kravitz
movie_description: Summary : In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper and a drifter named Max.

cast: Cast : Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary
movie_description: Summary : When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

movie_name: Title : Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
cast: Cast : Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
movie_description: Summary : Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

cast: Cast : Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman, Jerry O'Connell
movie_description: Summary : After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

movie_name: Title : Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
cast: Cast : Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Michael Gambon
movie_description: Summary : Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

cast: Cast : Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
movie_description: Summary : A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.
